text: It's important to be an individual. You don't have to wear Anamika from head to toe. Mix it up. That is style - Anamika khanna @voicesofiwc
If fashion is driven by insecurity or consumption it won't work. If you try to belong to a crowd it creates unhappiness- David Abraham #iwc
Kits not just about being well dressed but appropriately dressed. You can speak volumes without even opening your mouth - Malini Ramani @iwc
To be able to create from something that does not exist at all. And do it day after day. It's imp to be grateful that we can do this Anamika
If you use Eco friendly products and make the environment happy tharen you can be happy. - Monica shah @voicesofiwc
If you go beyond the fear of success and failure and focus on your creativity it will make you a better designer. - @n_joshipura #iwc
Fashion and state of mind directly related. If u r happy creativity goes to the next level Making people happy has brought me peace-Anamika
Live simple laugh loudly and love deeply that is what brings happiness. Wearing an Anamika khanna outfit makes me happy - @n_joshipura #iwc
Happiness is a state of life and as long as we are happy our fashion is happy - Anamika khanna #iwc
I was a happiness n a fashion junkie always and they both Came in my life 13 years ago
